price: 20. Usuk (Jibriil kinnuk) caylaleeh fayya le arac le, qarshi le rabbih xaqul.
arabic: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِي ٱلۡعَرۡشِ مَكِينٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: dhī quwwatin ʿinda dhī al-ʿarshi makīnin
